author: .vbuterin
content: So the idea of the verkle tree proof is that first you re-express it as a simple polynomial comimtment multi-proof

author: .vbuterin
content: For example, if you have a single verkle branch `A -> B -> C -> leaf`  with path 1, 3, 5

author: .vbuterin
content:
You re-express that as:

```
A(1) = hash(B)
B(3) = hash(C)
C(5) = hash(leaf)
```

author: .vbuterin
content: And you're trying to prove all three statements simultaneously
